Uses of Package
kba

  • Packages that use kba 
    Package Description
    kba  
  • Classes in kba used by kba 
    Class and Description
    ContentItem
    ContentItem is the thrift analog of http://trec-kba.org/schemas/v1.0/content-item.json The JSON version has a 'stages' property that contains descriptions **and also names** of additional properties on the ContentItem.
    ContentItem._Fields
    The set of fields this struct contains, along with convenience methods for finding and manipulating them.
    CorpusItem
    CorpusItem is the thrift equivalent of http://trec-kba.org/schemas/v1.0/corpus-item.json
    CorpusItem._Fields
    The set of fields this struct contains, along with convenience methods for finding and manipulating them.
    StreamItem
    This is the primary interface to the data.
    StreamItem._Fields
    The set of fields this struct contains, along with convenience methods for finding and manipulating them.
    StreamTime
    StreamTime is a timestamp measured in seconds since the 1970 epoch.
    StreamTime._Fields
    The set of fields this struct contains, along with convenience methods for finding and manipulating them.
